/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the center, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. 

On either side of the street, there are trees and power lines, adding a touch of urbanity to the natural beauty. The street itself is lined with yellow flowers, adding a pop of color to the scene. In the distance, you can see power lines stretching across the sky, a common sight in many cities. 

The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a unique perspective, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, looking up at the sky. The combination of natural and man-made elements creates a harmonious balance, reflecting the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
